intro: Stegnogramma jinfoshanensis, commonly known as the Jinfoshan starwort, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, commonly known as the buckwheat family. The plant is characterized by its small, star-shaped flowers and distinctive leaf morphology. It is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as mountain forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
